sqlMap.select:
select client_id as clientId,action_id as actionId,app_name as appName,expect_count as expectCount,actual_count as actualCount,success_count as successCount,client_seq as clientSeq,task_date as taskDate,update_time as updateTime,create_time as createTime from tb_client_report where task_date=date_sub(curdate(),interval #days# day) order by client_id,client_seq,task_type,action_id,app_name
limit $limit.offset$,$limit.maxRows$
select count(*) cnt from tb_client_report where task_date=date_sub(curdate(),interval #days# day)

select action_id as actionId,app_name as appName,sum(expect_count) as sumExpectCount,sum(actual_count) as sumActualCount,round(sum(actual_count)/sum(expect_count)*100,2) as actualScale,sum(success_count) as sumSuccessCount,if(round(sum(success_count)/sum(actual_count)*100,2) is null,0.0,round(sum(success_count)/sum(actual_count)*100,2)) as successScale from tb_client_report where task_date=date_sub(curdate(),interval #days# day) group by task_type,action_id,app_name
limit $limit.offset$,$limit.maxRows$
select count(*) cnt from ( select * from tb_client_report where task_date=date_sub(curdate(),interval #days# day) group by task_type,action_id,app_name) as t
